name: Santa Needs You!
description:
A simple and fun christmas story, where your goal is to save Santa to save the world!

Santa will play cards on 25th and if he loses the world will be invaded! But some of Santa's cards have been stolen and hidden in different timelines. Your mission is to recover the cards by following different paths. Once you find them you will be able to go to Santa's house.

Game is more storytelling with some puzzles. Short game.

Game Resolution: 1366x768
